name: Tetris (itch) (TheRealDan)
description:
Manoeuvre falling tetrominoes to create and clear lines in order to receive points and obtain a high score, clear 4 lines at once for bonus points while also trying to avoid stacking too high and losing the game, scores are added to the public scoreboard shown both in game and on my website

This game is also on my website and the source code can be found on my github
